item.description:

item.title: 美国农业收入降至 1,400 亿美元低于预期
item.description: 尽管玉米和大豆这两种美国最大的农作物价格暴跌，但美国农民今年的收入降幅将小于预期，仅比 2023 年下降 4.4%。【原文：US farmers are poised to see a smaller-than-expected drop in income this year, down only 4.4% from 2023 even as prices of corn and soybeans — America’s two biggest crops — have plummeted.】

item.title: MTN 董事会称正在调查针对其首席执行官的指控
item.description: 非洲用户数量最多的无线服务提供商 MTN 集团有限公司表示，正在调查首席执行官拉尔夫-穆皮塔（Ralph Mupita）涉嫌徇私舞弊的问题。【原文：MTN Group Ltd., Africa’s biggest wireless service provider by subscribers, said it’s probing issues of alleged favoritism by Chief Executive Officer Ralph Mupita.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体 69% 的暴跌使数十亿美元在禁售期结束前化为乌有
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）曾一度高歌猛进的媒体公司的股价正在下挫，而此时其空白支票交易的锁定期即将结束，可能会有更多股票涌入饱和的市场。【原文：The stock price of Donald Trump’s once-high-flying media company is sinking just as the lockup period from its blank-check deal is about to end, potentially flooding a saturated market with even more shares.】

item.title: 新总理上台，泰国议员批准 1110 亿美元预算案
item.description: 泰国国会下议院通过了从 10 月开始的财政年度的 3.75 万亿泰铢（约合 1,110 亿美元）预算，这将使新上任的总理巴东-钦那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）能够增加国家开支，以加速刚刚开始的经济复苏。【原文：Thailand’s lower house of parliament passed a 3.75 trillion baht ($111 billion) budget for the fiscal year starting October, which will allow newly-appointed Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra to lift state spending to accelerate a nascent economic recovery.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班将在最严峻的大选考验前放弃紧缩政策
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）将撕毁其巩固预算的承诺，在他执政十多年来最艰难的一次大选之前，发动一波支出浪潮。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is set to rip up his budget-consolidation promises to unleash a wave of spending before what’s shaping up to be the toughest election of his more than decade-long rule, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚面临粮食和燃料短缺，卡车司机封锁道路
item.description: 抗议的哥伦比亚卡车司机已连续第四天封锁道路，导致全国范围内出现粮食和燃料短缺的警告。【原文：A fourth day of road blockades by protesting Colombian truckers has led to warnings of food and fuel shortages nationwide.】

item.title: 普京称俄罗斯准备继续通过乌克兰输送天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京表示，俄罗斯准备在 2024 年之后继续通过穿越乌克兰的管道向欧洲输送天然气。【原文：Russia is ready to continue sending gas to Europe via pipelines across Ukraine beyond 2024, according to President Vladimir Putin.】

item.title: 土耳其首次公开募股失败引发投资者需求担忧
item.description: 土耳其最新上市的股票六年来首次落后于大盘，引发了投资者对首次公开募股的担忧。【原文：Turkey’s newest stocks are trailing the broader market for the first time in six years, prompting worries about investor appetite for initial public offerings.】

item.title: 卖空者安德鲁-莱福特的欺诈案定于 2025 年 9 月开庭审理
item.description: 在美国司法部和辩护律师就时间表达成一致后，卖空者安德鲁-莱福特（Andrew Left）的证券欺诈案审判定于 2025 年 9 月 30 日在洛杉矶联邦法院开庭。【原文：Short seller Andrew Left’s securities fraud trial has been scheduled to start Sept. 30, 2025, in federal court in Los Angeles, after the US Justice Department and defense lawyers agreed to a schedule.】

item.title: 欧佩克+达成协议，在油价暴跌后暂停计划中的石油加价
item.description: 欧佩克+同意在两个月内暂停石油增产计划，此前石油价格在需求脆弱、供应充足的情况下暴跌。【原文：OPEC+ agreed to pause its planned oil output hike for two months after prices plunged amid fragile demand and plentiful supply.】

item.title: CBOE 为寻求进入私人市场的交易商启动平台
item.description: CBOE Global Markets Inc. 正与一家总部位于伦敦的科技公司合作，为紧密持股公司的股票创建一个美国交易平台。【原文：CBOE Global Markets Inc. is partnering with a London-based tech firm to create a US trading platform for shares of closely held companies, a traditionally illiquid market that investors have increasingly sought to access.】

item.title: 赞比亚中央银行称，推动非美元化将带来秩序
item.description: 赞比亚中央银行行长丹尼-卡利亚亚（Denny Kalyalya）表示，赞比亚限制在国内交易中使用外汇的计划旨在稳定本国货币，他所在的组织正在就这些建议进行最后的磋商。【原文：Zambia’s plans to restrict the use of foreign exchange in domestic transactions are aimed at stabilizing the nation’s currency, central bank Governor Denny Kalyalya said, as his organization finalizes consultations on the proposals.】

item.title: Evercore 聘请高盛和摩根士丹利银行家参与 FIG 交易
item.description: Evercore Inc.从竞争对手那里招聘了两名高级人才，以加强其金融机构咨询业务。【原文：Evercore Inc. is building out its financial institutions advisory practice with two senior hires from bulge-bracket rivals.】

item.title: 贝莱德和 Jio 加入战团，Sanlam 着眼印度财富管理市场
item.description: 非洲市值最大的保险公司 Sanlam Ltd. 正在加入进军印度蓬勃发展的资产和财富管理行业的竞争行列，以寻求在全球增长最快的主要经济体寻找机会。【原文：Sanlam Ltd. is joining the race to enter India’s burgeoning asset- and wealth-management industry as Africa’s biggest insurer by market value seeks to tap opportunities in the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 俄罗斯柴油出口下滑至四个月最低点
item.description: 俄罗斯 8 月份的石油产品出口量降至四个月来的最低点，主要原因是柴油出口量急剧下降。【原文：Russia’s oil product exports dropped to a four-month low in August, mainly due to a sharp slide in diesel shipments.】

item.title: 马克龙的法国总理人选显示其野心正在瓦解
item.description: 前外交部长和欧盟委员米歇尔-巴尼耶在 2022 年总统大选前的党内初选中落败后，一直远离法国政坛。【原文：Michel Barnier, a former foreign minister and European commissioner, has kept away from French politics since suffering defeat in his party primary ahead of the 2022 presidential election.】

item.title: 贝恩斯坦联盟称土耳其债务和里拉之路坎坷不平
item.description: AllianceBernstein Holding LP 的新兴市场债务主管 Christian DiClementi 认为，在通胀高于预期和货币进一步疲软的情况下，土耳其里拉债券至少在六个月内都不会成为一项有吸引力的投资。【原文：Turkish lira bonds won’t be an attractive investment for at least six months amid higher-than-expected inflation and further weakening in the currency, according to Christian DiClementi, AllianceBernstein Holding LP’s director of emerging-market debt.】

item.title: 特拉华州马里兰附近的海上风电项目获美国批准
item.description: 拜登政府周四批准了在马里兰州海岸附近水域建造一座 2 千兆瓦风力发电厂的计划，这是第十个获得美国政府授权的商业规模海上涡轮机项目。【原文：The Biden administration on Thursday approved plans for a 2-gigawatt wind farm in waters near Maryland’s coast, marking the 10th commercial-scale offshore turbine project to win the US government’s authorization.】

item.title: 前交易所首席执行官 Tilly 接任 Clear Street 高层职位
item.description: Cboe Global Markets Inc. 前首席执行官 Ed Tilly 因未能披露个人关系而猝然结束了在这家公共交易所长达十年的任期，现在他已找到了新的首席执行官职位。【原文：Ed Tilly, the former chief executive officer of Cboe Global Markets Inc., has landed a new CEO post after his decade-long run atop the public exchange abruptly ended over his failure to disclose personal relationships.】

item.title: 加纳债券持有人支持 130 亿美元重组交换方案
item.description: 加纳商业债权人委员会支持政府提出的交换约 130 亿美元欧元债券的提议，这是该西非国家债务重组的关键部分。【原文：A committee of Ghana’s commercial creditors backed an offer by the government to exchange about $13 billion of eurobonds, a crucial part of the West African nation’s debt restructuring.】

item.title: 纽约银行收购 Archer 平台，进军零售财富领域
item.description: 纽约银行梅隆公司（Bank of New York Mellon Corp.【原文：Bank of New York Mellon Corp. is expanding further into the fast-growing retail wealth market by acquiring the Archer technology firm to handle infrastructure and distribution of managed accounts to financial advisers and their clients.】

item.title: 巴尼耶出任总理令法国市场稍感宽慰
item.description: 米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）被任命为法国总理，这刺激了法国资产的宽松，投资者希望政治家们现在能将注意力转向即将到来的预算。【原文：The appointment of Michel Barnier as France’s prime minister spurred relief in the nation’s assets, with investors hopeful that politicians will now turn their focus to the upcoming budget.】

item.title: 银行因债务风险限制贷款，泰国电动汽车销量将达不到目标
item.description: 据一个行业组织称，随着泰国家庭债务徘徊在创纪录水平附近，贷款机构在批准新的汽车贷款时变得更加谨慎，泰国今年的电动汽车销量将达不到目标。【原文：Thailand’s electric vehicle sales are set to miss target this year as lenders turn more cautious in sanctioning new auto loans with the nation’s household debt hovering near a record, according to an industry group.】

item.title: 匈牙利在欧盟轮值主席国反击中取消央行会议
item.description: 匈牙利央行取消了一次高级别会议，这是匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）担任欧盟轮值主席国期间引发争议的最新附带损害。【原文：Hungary’s central bank canceled a high-level conference, the latest collateral damage from the country’s controversial European Union presidency under Prime Minister Viktor Orban.】

item.title: 卢拉的《绿色燃料法》有利于农民而非石油巨头巴西国家石油公司
item.description: 巴西的新立法将支持农民，推动更多的需求转向生物燃料，而不是国家控制的石油巨头巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）生产的化石燃料。【原文：New legislation in Brazil is set to support farmers by pushing additional demand toward biofuels — and away from the fossil fuels produced by state-controlled oil giant Petroleo Brasileiro SA.】

item.title: 亚洲两大富豪向印度 "妈妈和孩子 "投资者示好
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）和高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）正在向印度的散户投资者招手，因为这批投资者正在印度的金融市场上站稳脚跟。【原文：Billionaires Mukesh Ambani and Gautam Adani are wooing India’s retail investors as this cadre entrenches itself into the country’s financial markets.】
